Aggregate Atmospheric Data to Monthly Values

Source: R/prepare_atmosphere_data.R
create_monthly_atm.Rd

Aggregate Atmospheric Data to Monthly Values

Usage

create_monthly_atm(atm = prepare_atmosphere_data())

Arguments

atm

atm as retrieved by prepare_atmosphere_data

Value

tibble with yearly atmospheric data values

Examples

create_monthly_atm()
#> # A tibble: 48 × 5
#>    date_end   rain_mm irrigation_groundwater_mm irrigation_clearwater_mm poten…¹
#>    <date>       <dbl>                     <dbl>                    <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1 2017-01-31    42.4                   0                            0      8.11
#>  2 2017-02-28    31.7                   0                           17.0   17.3 
#>  3 2017-03-31    46.6                   0                           19.2   49.0 
#>  4 2017-04-30    24.4                   0                           18.4   60.6 
#>  5 2017-05-31    98.1                   0.00145                     20.0  101.  
#>  6 2017-06-30   114.                    0.0406                      27.3  115.  
#>  7 2017-07-31   138.                    0.00234                     26.8  104.  
#>  8 2017-08-31    90.4                   0                           25.2   86.1 
#>  9 2017-09-30    52.7                   0                           22.8   44.3 
#> 10 2017-10-31    46.1                   0                           21.9   30.1 
#> # … with 38 more rows, and abbreviated variable name ¹​potential_evaporation_mm
